Name: Paranormal Stories
About the game: Esther, a paranormal detective, got the ability of recalling an event by being in the crime scene or touching things in the crime scene which are connected to the victim right after she was struck by a blue lightning. However, her analysis will be in vain without evidence. As the result, she, along with her ability to see an event to look for a motive, has to gather all the evidence in the crime scene. Assist Esther in this hidden object game, as she helps people with her clairvoyant ability, to solve paranormal crimes... - Nostalgic and classic hidden object gameplay - Enjoy challenging hidden object levels - Follow Esterâ€™s story across 5 paranormal cases - 20 exciting upgrade scenes - Original mystery music
